videoSnippet.title: Magnus vs Hans and Hikaru || The Perfect Storm of Modern Chess
videoSnippet.description:
Become a Part of a Great Family! https://onelink.to/lotus-agadmator 
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/
Thumbnail photos by Lennart Ootes https://x.com/LennartOotes

0:00 Hello Everyone!
00:24 Small Announcement!
01:09 Game Starts!
02:30 Completely New Game!
05:00 Pause the video!
07:43 It Was In This Position
08:10 Hikaru vs Magnus 
10:30 CNG2
12:00 PTV2!
20:00 IWITP2!
21:45 Legends of the Channel
22:08 Become a Part of a Great Family!

Nakamura, Hikaru (3391) - Carlsen, Magnus (3352)
Titled Tuesday 2025 (Chess.com) [08] 2025.08.19
B01 Scandinavian (centre counter) defence

1.e4 d5 2.exd5 Qxd5 3.Nc3 Qa5 4.d4 c6 5.Bd2 Bf5 6.Bc4 e6 7.Nf3 Nd7 8.Qe2 Ngf6 9.d5 cxd5 10.Nxd5 Qc5 11.Nxf6+ gxf6 12.Be3 Qa5+ 13.c3 a6 14.Rd1 Be7 15.O-O Rg8 16.Bf4 Bg4 17.Qe4 O-O-O 18.b4 Qa4 19.Bg3 Nb6 20.Qf4 e5 21.Nxe5 Rxd1 22.Nxg4 Bd6 23.Qf5+ Kb8 24.Bb3 Rxf1+ 25.Kxf1 Qc6 26.Nxf6 Rd8 27.Ne4 Bxg3 28.hxg3 Ka7 29.Kg1 Nd5 30.Qe5 f6 31.Qd4+ Qb6 32.Nc5 Ne7 33.Qe4 Ng6 34.Bd5 f5 35.Qe6 Qxe6 36.Bxe6 Rd1+ 37.Kh2 Rd2 38.f3 Ne7 39.a4 Rc2 40.c4 Rb2 41.b5 a5 42.Nd7 Rb4 43.b6+ Ka8 44.Nc5 Rxb6 45.Bd7 Rd6 46.Bb5 Kb8 47.Nd7+ Kc7 48.Ne5 Nc6 49.Nf7 Rf6 50.Ng5 h6 51.Nh3 Nd4 52.Nf4 Kd6 53.Be8 Rf8 54.Bg6 Rc8 55.Bf7 Nb3 56.Be6 Rf8 57.Bd5 Nc5 58.Ng6 Rb8 59.Nh4 Ke5 60.f4+ Kf6 61.Nf3 Nxa4 62.g4 fxg4 63.Ne5 Nc5 64.Nxg4+ Kg7 65.f5 Rf8 66.f6+ Rxf6
